local_schema.short_desc: Seconds of inactivity to spin down when on battery
local_schema.longdesc: The number of seconds of inactivity to spin down the disks when on battery power.

local_schema.short_desc: Seconds of inactivity to spin down when on AC
local_schema.longdesc: The number of seconds of inactivity to spin down the disks when on AC power.

local_schema.short_desc: If the low-power mode should be enabled when on battery
local_schema.longdesc: If the system low-power mode should be enabled when on laptop battery power.

local_schema.short_desc: If the low-power mode should be enabled when on AC
local_schema.longdesc: If the system low-power mode should be enabled when on AC power.
